projects.name: Crypt Run: Death is just the beginning (Wii U/PC/Mac/Linux)
projects.blurb: Crypt Run is an ever-changing medieval fantasy hack 'n slash that isn't over when you die.

projects.name: BatZ - Old-School Arcade Game
projects.blurb: This is a game for arcade game fans, so we want to make it with arcade game fans! In this game you get to kill bats, lots of BatZ!

projects.name: 7 Days to Die  - Zombie Survival Game
projects.blurb: An open world, voxel-based, sandbox game blending the best elements of FPS, Survival Horror, Tower Defense and Role Playing Games.

projects.name: Balrum
projects.blurb: An open world fantasy RPG with building, farming and crafting. For PC, Mac and Linux.

projects.name: Tangiers - Stealth driven by dark 20th century avant-garde.
projects.blurb: Tangiers - Stealth gameplay meets the darker avant-garde of the 20th century.

projects.name: Codename Cygnus - an Interactive Radio Drama for iOS
projects.blurb: Play as a secret agent in an interactive fictional world inspired by old time radio dramas.

projects.name: Rise Of The Dark King, 12 Year Old Creates A Video Game!
projects.blurb: Rise Of The Dark is a RPG video game created by a 12 year old and many other family members and friends.

projects.name: Crazy World of Action Cat
projects.blurb: Inspired by Metal Slug with a Paper Mario look.You play as Action Cat - the Ultimate Military Fighting Force.

projects.name: CANDLE - A Dynamic Graphic Adventure
projects.blurb: A dynamic graphic adventure with handmade visuals - an incredible mixture of the Graphic Adventure and Platformer genres

projects.name: DEUS EX MACHINA 2: REBOOT
projects.blurb: The first multimedia video game that was ever made is rebooted! Starring Christopher Lee.

projects.name: Chroma Squad - manager game with japanese-style super heroes
projects.blurb: Tactical turn-based manager game, with sentai heroes and old-school pixel art. Manage your own sentai TV studio!

projects.name: Horror Game Creator & HD FREE Indie Games
projects.blurb: Ever wanted to create your own indie horror game? or play HD quality games for free? Well check out this new project!

projects.name: Labyrinthine Dreams
projects.blurb: An emotional and immersive puzzle-story experience.

projects.name: Insignificant
projects.blurb: An Open World RPG where you're three inches tall. Think Elder Scrolls meets Shadow of the Colossus meets The Borrowers.

projects.name: DwarfCorp
projects.blurb: A lighthearted simulation game in which you manage a colony of ruthless capitalist Dwarves. Explore, exploit, and profit!

projects.name: SOS SAGA Otome Game
projects.blurb: After 15 years of working on my fiction and web comic, I would love to make the story into a visual novel.

projects.name: Tread Lightly
projects.blurb: "seeing is believing..." a young girl copes with the past in this narrative-centric puzzle platformer

projects.name: Sword 'N' Board - Now coming to Wii U!
projects.blurb: In Sword 'N' Board you will battle your way through imaginary enemies, cardboard forests, dark pillow fort dungeons!

projects.name: E.K. Ballo the Demon Slayer  Christian MMORPG
projects.blurb:
The Internets First Christian MMORPG Adventure Game!  Send to
Tartarus the demonic power structures that sit and rule over cities

projects.name: Shiden
projects.blurb: High octane, explosion packed, arcade style SHMUP action! Fly high soldier!
